actions.name: AddTagsToOnPremisesInstances
actions.description: Add tags to one or more on-premises instances.

actions.name: BatchGetApplicationRevisions
actions.description: Gets information about one or more application revisions.

actions.name: BatchGetApplications
actions.description: Get information about multiple applications associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: BatchGetDeploymentGroups
actions.description: Get information about one or more deployment groups.

actions.name: BatchGetDeploymentInstances
actions.description: Gets information about one or more instance that are part of a deployment group.

actions.name: BatchGetDeploymentTargets
actions.description: Returns an array of one or more targets associated with a deployment. This method works with all compute types and should be used instead of the deprecated BatchGetDeploymentInstances. The maximum number of targets that can be returned is 25.

actions.name: BatchGetDeployments
actions.description: Get information about multiple deployments associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: BatchGetOnPremisesInstances
actions.description: Get information about one or more on-premises instances.

actions.name: ContinueDeployment
actions.description: Starts the process of rerouting traffic from instances in the original environment to instances in thereplacement environment without waiting for a specified wait time to elapse.

actions.name: CreateApplication
actions.description: Create an application associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: CreateCloudFormationDeployment
actions.description: Create CloudFormation deployment to cooperate ochestration for a CloudFormation stack update.

actions.name: CreateDeployment
actions.description: Create a deployment for an application associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: CreateDeploymentConfig
actions.description: Create a custom deployment configuration associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: CreateDeploymentGroup
actions.description: Create a deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: DeleteApplication
actions.description: Delete an application associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: DeleteDeploymentConfig
actions.description: Delete a custom deployment configuration associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: DeleteDeploymentGroup
actions.description: Delete a deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: DeleteGitHubAccountToken
actions.description: Deletes a GitHub account connection.

actions.name: DeleteResourcesByExternalId
actions.description: Delete resources associated with the given external Id.

actions.name: DeregisterOnPremisesInstance
actions.description: Deregister an on-premises instance.

actions.name: GetApplication
actions.description: Get information about a single application associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: GetApplicationRevision
actions.description: Get information about a single application revision for an application associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: GetDeployment
actions.description: Get information about a single deployment to a deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: GetDeploymentConfig
actions.description: Get information about a single deployment configuration associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: GetDeploymentGroup
actions.description: Get information about a single deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: GetDeploymentInstance
actions.description: Get information about a single instance in a deployment associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: GetDeploymentTarget
actions.description: Returns information about a deployment target.

actions.name: GetOnPremisesInstance
actions.description: Get information about a single on-premises instance.

actions.name: ListApplicationRevisions
actions.description: Get information about all application revisions for an application associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: ListApplications
actions.description: Get information about all applications associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: ListDeploymentConfigs
actions.description: Get information about all deployment configurations associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: ListDeploymentGroups
actions.description: Get information about all deployment groups for an application associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: ListDeploymentInstances
actions.description: Get information about all instances in a deployment associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: ListDeploymentTargets
actions.description: Returns an array of target IDs that are associated a deployment.

actions.name: ListDeployments
actions.description: Get information about all deployments to a deployment group associated with the IAM user, or to get all deployments associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: ListGitHubAccountTokenNames
actions.description: Lists the names of stored connections to GitHub accounts.

actions.name: ListOnPremisesInstances
actions.description: Get a list of one or more on-premises instance names.

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Returns a list of tags for the resource identified by a specified ARN. Tags are used to organize and categorize your CodeDeploy resources.

actions.name: PutLifecycleEventHookExecutionStatus
actions.description: Notify a lifecycle event hook execution status for associated deployment with the IAM user.

actions.name: RegisterApplicationRevision
actions.description: Register information about an application revision for an application associated with the IAM user.

actions.name: RegisterOnPremisesInstance
actions.description: Register an on-premises instance.

actions.name: RemoveTagsFromOnPremisesInstances
actions.description: Remove tags from one or more on-premises instances.

actions.name: SkipWaitTimeForInstanceTermination
actions.description: In a blue/green deployment, overrides any specified wait time and starts terminating instances immediately after the traffic routing is complete.

actions.name: StopDeployment
actions.description: Description for StopDeployment

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Associates the list of tags in the input Tags parameter with the resource identified by the ResourceArn input parameter.

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Disassociates a resource from a list of tags. The resource is identified by the ResourceArn input parameter. The tags are identfied by the list of keys in the TagKeys input parameter.

actions.name: UpdateApplication
actions.description: Description for UpdateApplication

actions.name: UpdateDeploymentGroup
actions.description: Change information about a single deployment group for an application associated with the IAM user.
